additionalInformation: Bracer automatically upgrade on the 25th minute mark.

The item's attributes grants the following bonuses: 100/200 health and 1.25/2.5 health regeneration. 24/48 mana and 0.1/0.2 mana regeneration. 2/4 attack speed bonus and 0.33/0.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes and 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
2/4 attack speed bonus and 0.33/0.67 main armor.
5/10 main attack damage to heroes and 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
name: Bracer
description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
tips: For most non-strength heroes, it grants as much attack damage as a Wraith Band or Null Talisman.
